mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ, A.EDU_SUBJECT, (CASE A.EDU_STATE WHEN '01' THEN '접수대기' WHEN '02' THEN '접수중' WHEN '03' THEN '접수마감' ELSE NULL END) AS EDU_STATE, A.EDU_ORGANIZATION, A.EDU_TARGET, A.EDU_APPLY_SDATE, A.EDU_APPLY_EDATE, A.EDU_RUNNING_SDATE, A.EDU_RUNNING_EDATE, A.EDU_RECEIPT_GBN, A.EDU_RECRUIT_NUMBER, A.EDU_LOCATION, A.EDU_INQUIRY_CALL, NOW(6) AS META_DATA1, NULL AS META_DATA2, 'META_DATA3' AS META_DATA3 FROM POST_EDUCATION AS A
